attributes.action: Make public sexual harrasment a crime and help youngsters.
attributes.additional_details: The reason why I want to do this is I've heard stories and it's disgusting. Many females are traumatised to even go outside nowadays, they fear that theyll go through something that would traumatise them.
attributes.background: To make public sexual harrasment a crime and to just help young girls that may have experience it before and prevent it happening to anyone else hopefully.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577443

Make sexual harassment a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
